PlayDescription: J.Lambo kicks 65 yards from JAC 35 to end zone, Touchback. Patriots 14th conference title game appearance, ties Dallas for 3rd all-time (Pittsburgh 16 & SF 15). Patriots 7th-straight conference title game appearance, extends NFL record. NE Belichick 12th conference championship game & 38th postseason game as a head coach, extends NFL records.
